channel.title: CVE Feed for SolidWP -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SolidWP -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28786|2024-08-02T13:51:37.297Z -- solidwp -- solid%20security%20%E2%80%93%20password%2C%20two%20factor%20authentication%2C%20and%20brute%20force%20protection
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in SolidWP Solid Security – Password, Two Factor Authentication, and Brute Force Protection.This issue affects Solid Security – Password, Two Factor Authentication, and Brute Force Protection: from n/a through 8.1.4.

item.title: CVE-2022-44593|2024-06-24T20:39:00.593Z -- solidwp -- solid%20security
item.description: Use of Less Trusted Source vulnerability in SolidWP Solid Security allows HTTP DoS.This issue affects Solid Security: from n/a through 9.3.1.
